name: Ashwagandha
description: Ashwagandha is an ancient medicinal herb with multiple health benefits, including reduced anxiety and stress.

name: Turmeric
description: Turmeric is a popular spice with powerful anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties.

name: Brahmi
description: Brahmi is known for improving brain function and enhancing memory and concentration.

name: Triphala
description: Triphala is an herbal concoction that helps in detoxification and promotes digestive health.

name: Neem
description: Neem is used for its anti-bacterial, anti-fungal, and anti-inflammatory properties.

name: Tulsi
description: Tulsi, or Holy Basil, is revered for its healing properties and is used to treat a variety of ailments.

name: Ginger
description: Ginger is widely used for its digestive benefits and to reduce nausea and inflammation.

name: Amla
description: Amla is rich in Vitamin C and helps boost immunity, enhance digestion, and improve skin health.

name: Shilajit
description: Shilajit is a natural substance that boosts energy, improves stamina, and promotes overall health.

name: Gokshura
description: Gokshura is known for its benefits in boosting strength and vitality and improving kidney health.

name: Licorice
description: Licorice root is used to soothe digestive issues, respiratory problems, and skin conditions.

name: Fenugreek
description: Fenugreek is used for its benefits in regulating blood sugar levels and improving digestion.

name: Guduchi
description: Guduchi, also known as Giloy, is known for its immunity-boosting and anti-inflammatory properties.

name: Shatavari
description: Shatavari is used for its benefits in supporting female reproductive health and balancing hormones.

name: Bitter Melon
description: Bitter Melon is used to regulate blood sugar levels and improve digestion.

name: Cumin
description: Cumin is a spice known for its digestive benefits and ability to enhance the flavor of foods.

name: Cardamom
description: Cardamom is a spice with digestive benefits and a pleasant aroma, often used in cooking and teas.

name: Fennel
description: Fennel seeds are known for their digestive benefits and can help reduce bloating and gas.

name: Coriander
description: Coriander seeds are used to improve digestion and help detoxify the body.

name: Hibiscus
description: Hibiscus is used to make tea that can help lower blood pressure and improve liver health.

name: Moringa
description: Moringa is a nutrient-dense plant that boosts energy levels, improves digestion, and enhances overall health.

name: Cinnamon
description: Cinnamon is a spice with powerful antioxidant properties, used to improve metabolism and digestion.

name: Saffron
description: Saffron is a precious spice known for its rich flavor and potential health benefits, including mood enhancement.

name: Boswellia
description: Boswellia is known for its anti-inflammatory properties and is used to support joint health.

name: Gotu Kola
description: Gotu Kola is an herb that supports brain function, promotes skin health, and improves circulation.
